resources.string: Complete Positive Habits to earn gold and experience! Negative Habits will hurt your avatar if you tap them, so avoid them in real life!
Defeat your repeating Daily tasks to gain gold and experience. Danger! Dailies will hurt your avatar if you don\'t complete them in time.
Complete your To-Dos in real life, then check them off for GOLD and EXPERIENCE so you can earn Rewards and unlock new features!
These are your Rewards! Earn gold by completing real-world Habits, Dailies, and To-Dos. Then spend it on in-game Rewards or custom real-world Rewards!
When you buy equipment, it appears here. Your Battle Gear affects your stats, and your Costume (if enabled) affects what your avatar wears.
Earn items by completing tasks and leveling up. Tap on an item to use it!
As you complete real-world tasks, you now have a random chance of finding eggs and potions. Combine them to hatch pets

Skills are special abilities that have powerful effects! Tap on a skill to use it. It will cost Mana (the blue bar), which you earn by checking in every day and by completing your real-life tasks. Check out the FAQ in the menu for more info!
This is where you and your friends can hold each other accountable to your goals and fight monsters with your tasks!
Welcome to the Tavern, a public, all-ages chatroom! Here you can chat about productivity and ask questions. Have fun!
Choose to become a Warrior, Mage, Healer, or Rogue! Each class has unique equipment and skills. Tap the (?) to learn more!
